AadOauth2Auth.description: The Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Gets B2c Directory resources under a subscription for the Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory resource provider

post.description: Checks that the trusted signing account name is valid and is not already in use.

get.description: Gets Ciam Directory resources under a subscription for the Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory resource provider
Gets Guest Usages resources under a subscription for the Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory resource provider
Gets B2c Directory resources under a resource group for the Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory resource provider
Gets a B2c Directory resource for the Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory resource provider

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The initial domain name of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

put.description: Creates a B2c Directory resource, which is used to linking a subscription to an instance of Azure AD External Identities. [Learn more](https://aka.ms/extidbilling).

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The initial domain name of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.description: The initial domain name of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

parameters.description: B2c Directory Resource to be updated

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The initial domain name of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

B2CResourceSKUName.description: The name of the SKU for the tenant.

values.name: Standard
values.description: Azure AD B2C usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses a monthly active users (MAU) billing model.

values.name: PremiumP1
values.description: Azure AD B2C usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses number of authentications based billing.

values.name: PremiumP2
values.description: Azure AD B2C usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses number of authentications based billing.

values.name: A0
values.description: The SKU tier used for all Azure AD B2C tenants.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The B2cDirectoryResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

B2cDirectoryResourceProperties.description: Properties of the Azure AD B2C tenant Azure resource.

billingConfig.description: The billing configuration for the tenant.

tenantId.description: An identifier of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

isGoLocalTenant.description: Enable GoLocal add-on to store data at rest in the specific Geo. Refer to [aka.ms/B2CDataResidency](https://aka.ms/B2CDataResidency) to see local data residency options.

B2cDirectoryResourceUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the B2cDirectoryResource.

B2cDirectoryResourceUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the B2cDirectoryResource.

sku.description: SKU properties of the Azure AD B2C tenant. Learn more about Azure AD B2C billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cBilling).

properties.description: The Azure AD B2C tenant resource properties.

B2cResourceSku.description: SKU properties of the Azure AD B2C tenant. Learn more about Azure AD B2C billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cBilling).

name.description: The name of the SKU for the tenant.

B2cTenantResourceProperties.description: Properties of the Azure AD B2C tenant Azure resource.

billingConfig.description: The billing configuration for the tenant.

tenantId.description: An identifier of the Azure AD B2C tenant.

isGoLocalTenant.description: Enable GoLocal add-on to store data at rest in the specific Geo. Refer to [aka.ms/B2CDataResidency](https://aka.ms/B2CDataResidency) to see local data residency options.

B2cTenantResourcePropertiesBillingConfig.description: The billing configuration for the tenant.

billingType.description: The type of billing. Will be MAU for all new customers. If 'Auths', it can be updated to 'MAU'. Cannot be changed if value is 'MAU'. Learn more about Azure AD B2C billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cbilling).

effectiveStartDateUtc.description: The data from which the billing type took effect

BillingType.description: The type of billing. Will be MAU for all new customers. If 'Auths', it can be updated to 'MAU'. Cannot be changed if value is 'MAU'. Learn more about Azure AD B2C billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cbilling).

values.name: MAU
values.description: Azure AD B2C usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses a monthly active users (MAU) billing model.

values.name: Auths
values.description: Azure AD B2C usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses number of authentications based billing.

CiamBillingType.description: The type of billing. Will be MAU for all new customers. Cannot be changed if value is 'MAU'. Learn more about Azure AD for customers billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cbilling).

values.name: MAU
values.description: Azure AD for customers usage is billed to a linked Azure subscription and uses a monthly active users (MAU) billing model.

billingConfig.description: The billing configuration for the tenant.

tenantId.description: An identifier of the Azure AD for customers tenant.

CiamTenantResourcePropertiesBillingConfi.description: The billing configuration for the tenant.

billingType.description: The type of billing. Will be MAU for all new customers. Cannot be changed if value is 'MAU'. Learn more about Azure AD for customers billing at [aka.ms/b2cBilling](https://aka.ms/b2cbilling).

effectiveStartDateUtc.description: The data from which the billing type took effect

CreateCiamTenantProperties.description: These properties are used to create the Azure AD for customers tenant. These properties are not part of the Azure resource.

displayName.description: The display name of the Azure AD for customers tenant.

countryCode.description: Country code of Azure tenant (e.g. 'US'). Refer to [https://aka.ms/ciam-data-location](https://aka.ms/ciam-data-location) to see valid country codes and corresponding data residency locations. If you do not see a country code in an valid data residency location, choose one from the list.

countryCode.description: The country code where the resource will be in
